panels.description: Measures activity of companies users daily. Activity is defined as: creating issue, PR, commit, comment. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: Companies daily activity

panels.description: Measures number of company developers active in given week. Activity is defined as: creating issue, PR, commit, comment. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: Companies active authors weekly

panels.description: Number of issues created by company developers weekly. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: Issues created by company weekly

panels.description: Number of PRs created by company developers weekly. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: PRs created by company weekly

panels.description: Number of commits created by company developers weekly. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: Company commits weekly

panels.description: Number of comments written by company developers weekly. Counts comments on Issues, PRs and reviews. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: Comments by company weekly
